articles.title: The World’s Biggest Bitcoin Mine Is Rattling This Texas Oil Town
articles.description: A cashstrapped city in rural Texas will soon be home to the world’s largest bitcoin mine. Local protesters are “raising hell.”

articles.title: PayPal to Allow Businesses Buy and Sell Crypto
articles.description: The change will bring bitcoin and other virtual coins to "millions" of merchants across the US.
articles.content:
It's about to get easier for US merchants to use cryptocurrency for payments. PayPal is launching a new service to allow the businesses that use its platform to buy, hold and sell crypto.
